name: 60 Second History
description:
60 Second History is a game where you play a series of minigames to create your own messed up timeline. History changes depending on how you play the game, from little cosmetic details to entire separate branches of history with their own unique minigames. After six ten-second minigames, you'll be shown an ending that tells you what your version of the future is like.  

It only takes 1 minute to decide the world's fate... Will you create a utopia? A barren wasteland? Or perhaps a world inhabited entirely by cats?  It's your choice.
